summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CineStarMaps AI movie recommendation app. Backend APIs working well (93.3% success). Frontend loads and displays movie graph correctly, but node interaction has issues preventing movie card access.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Add favorite operation times out occasionally

ui_bugs.issue: Node clicking doesn't trigger movie card panel consistently
Hover tooltips not appearing reliably on node hover

integration_issues.issue: Logout doesn't redirect to landing page properly

passed_tests: Landing page with rotating planet loads correctly
All auth buttons (Google, Apple, Telegram) present and clickable
Magic link authentication flow works end-to-end
AI query validation correctly accepts/rejects queries
AI movie recommendations generate graph with GPT-5.2
Movie graph renders with Canvas 2D showing nodes and connections
Header search input works after initial search
Movie detail API returns correct data structure
Favorites and History API endpoints functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical node clicking issue in MovieGraphCanvas component. The graph renders beautifully but users cannot click on movie nodes to view details. Check click event handling and node hit detection in the Canvas 2D implementation. Also fix logout redirect and hover tooltip reliability.
